statements: DELETE FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE foundation_name = 'ABC Foundation';
DELETE FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE foundation_id = 101 AND funding_amount > 10000;
DELETE FROM Philanthropic_Foundations WHERE social_initiative = 'Education' AND impact_evaluation LIKE '%positive%'
DELETE FROM Grants WHERE amount < 10000 AND foundation_id = 'd35b9536-0f0b-4aec-aea8-fa35ac0cf1a2';
DELETE FROM Foundations WHERE founding_date < '2000-01-01' AND focus_area = 'Education';
DELETE FROM Grants WHERE amount < 1000 AND foundation_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Recipients WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Grants WHERE grant_id = 1001 AND project_id = 2001;
